title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 176 - Reimbursement For Institutional Care, Aftercare Supervision, Foster Care And Detention
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 176 - Reimbursement For Institutional Care, Aftercare Supervision, Foster Care And Detention

State Regulations
§ 176.1 - Expenditures for care and maintenance in voluntary child caring agencies
§ 176.2 - Scope of care and maintenance
§ 176.3 - Reimbursement of expenditures for care and maintenance
§ 176.4 - Claims for state reimbursement for care and maintenance provided in voluntary child caring agencies
§ 176.5 - Repayments and refunds
§ 176.6 - Annual adjustment of per diem rates for care provided by voluntary child caring agencies
§ 176.7 - Expenditures for care and maintenance in division for youth facilities
§ 176.8 - Establishment of per diem rates
§ 176.9 - Scope of care and maintenance in division for youth facilities
§ 176.10 - Charges for expenditures for care and maintenance in division for youth facilities
§ 176.11 - Repayments and refunds for support of children in the division
§ 176.12 - Reimbursement for detention expenditures

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 176

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§529, 530, art. 19-G
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
